description: Main entry point for the Vue.js frontend application, initializing the app, setting up plugins (Pinia for state management, Vue Router for routing), and mounting the application to a DOM element.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Creates a Vue application instance with the root component 'App'.

methods.name: createPinia
methods.description: Creates a Pinia store and is registered as a plugin with the Vue application.
